channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 16:08 The threat of artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 16:08 The threat of artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
